{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Planet |model=WNRT-627 |revision=v1 (??) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |manuf=TP-LINK |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7241 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9287 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} ''300Mbps 802.11n Wireless Broadband Router''
[http://www.planet.com.tw/en/product/product.php?id=34683 Product page] :[http://www.planet.com.tw/en/product/images/34683/C-WNRT-627_s.pdf Datasheet] :[http://www.planet.com.tw/en/product/images/34683/WNRT-627%20User%20Manual_v1.0.pdf Manual] '''Planet''''s site indicates FW is available for a v2 revision. It is dated Aug. 2013. :This one, which is the one discussed on the DD-WRT forums in 2012, is presumed to be the v1 unit. [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=721934 On the '''DD-WRT Forums''']
[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/planet-wnrt-627-300mbps-80211n-wireless-broadband-2226 On '''SpeedGuide.net'''] Additional specifications, per '''Planet''''s datasheet, follow... *Dimensions (L x W x H): [[Dimensions::174 mm x 110 mm x 23 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::280 g]] Default settings are per '''Planet''''s manual. :The sample SSID is shown as '''default'''.
